title: Milk [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Mairi Cameron, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
brief_description: A tenuous friendship is formed between a reclusive older gentleman (Arthur Dignam) and his younger neighbour downstairs (Kris McQuade), with milk providing the fragile link between them.
